review: Easy to connect and works great
author: satisfied customer

review: Have enjoyed this more than we thought we would.  Very slick packaging, easy to install, simple remote and great package of movies and TV shows on Prime.  Shows run smoothly over Wi-Fi to the TV.  Have also enjoyed several games.  If you already are a Prime member, I would highly recommend purchasing.
author: Paul Golden

review: awesome product for the price. everything i needed
author: morganne

review: it seems to take a long time to load movies,the movies cut in and out like its trying to reload.
author: john heinzerling

review: I have had to travel a lot, and this helps me  relax by seen my favorite shows
author: L. Cox

review: Works awesome! Wish everything I bought worked as it was intended like the fire stick does..
author: Brian

review: So very easy to plug in and begin to use !  Thanks for Incuding a USB to HDMI Cable.I was concerned because it did not show or mention its inclusion in your item description, which is usually so thorough. GREAT DEVICE.
author: DAX

review: Got this for my husband. Works right out of the box! cheaper than Apple TU. Happy!
author: Retta "TravelGuide"
